metadata.category: Building an AI Image Generation App with ImagePlayground
metadata.title: Introduction to ImagePlayground & Apple Intelligence

sections.title: Introduction to ImagePlayground & Apple Intelligence

inlineContent.text: Understand the core concepts of the ImagePlayground framework and
the principles of Apple Intelligence-based image generation.

sections.chapter: Chapter 1: Introduction to ImagePlayground & Apple Intelligence

inlineContent.text: To use ImagePlayground, first import the framework.
It’s only available on iOS 18 and later.
Let’s explore the core components of ImagePlayground.
Apple Intelligence is Apple’s on-device AI system
introduced in iOS 18.
Privacy-centric
: Most processing is performed directly on the device
Integrated experience
: Consistent AI capabilities across the system
Personalization
: Intelligent features that understand user context
ImagePlayground is a framework that allows you to leverage
Apple Intelligence’s image generation capabilities directly in your app.
Here’s the basic structure for displaying the ImagePlayground sheet.
When the user taps a button, the image generation UI appears.
The generation process proceeds as follows:
ImagePlayground provides a user-driven image generation experience.
While apps can suggest concepts and prompts,
the final image generation is always explicitly confirmed by the user.
This prevents unintended image generation and
gives users complete control.
It’s important to check ImagePlayground availability at runtime.
Use the
property to verify if it’s available on the current device.
Conditionally display UI based on availability.
Provide appropriate guidance to users when unavailable.
ImagePlayground is only available on devices that
support Apple Intelligence.
Supported Devices:
iPhone 15 Pro and later (A17 Pro chip)
iPad with M1 chip or later
Mac with M1 chip or later
Additional Requirements:
iOS 18.0 or later
Apple Intelligence enabled (manually activated by user in Settings)
Supported language and region settings
What is the most important value that ImagePlayground,
as part of Apple Intelligence, prioritizes?
Maximum image generation speed
While speed is important, the core value of
Apple Intelligence is privacy-centric design.
Privacy protection and on-device processing
Apple Intelligence performs most processing directly on the device,
prioritizing user data privacy above all else.
Cloud-based unlimited image generation
Apple Intelligence focuses on on-device processing,
and cloud is only used limitedly through Private Cloud Compute.
Who has the final decision in image generation
in ImagePlayground?
The app developer controls it programmatically.
Developers can suggest concepts, but
final generation is explicitly confirmed by the user.
The user always explicitly confirms and selects.
ImagePlayground provides a user-driven experience,
preventing unintended image generation.
Apple Intelligence automatically selects the optimal image.
While AI generates options,
the final selection is always up to the user.
